text: niṅṅaḷiruvaruṁ allāhuvilēkk paścāttapiccu maṭaṅṅunnuveṅkil atāṇ niṅṅaḷkkuttamaṁ. kāraṇaṁ, niṅṅaḷiruvaruṭeyuṁ manas'sukaḷ vyaticaliccu pēāyiṭṭuṇṭ. athavā niṅṅaḷiruvaruṁ addēhattinetire parasparaṁ sahāyikkukayāṇeṅkil aṟiyuka: allāhuvāṇ addēhattinṟe rakṣakan. pinne jibrīluṁ saccaritarāya muḻuvan satyaviśvāsikaḷuṁ malakkukaḷumellāṁ addēhattinṟe sahāyikaḷāṇ
